attributes.action: Mothers benefit should be stopped and prosecuted for not allowin fathers to see their children
attributes.additional_details:
It is time that women that refuse access to the father of there children without any legal reason should be prosecuted and Made to pay the court cost as long as the father has paid
Child maintenance and has loved and cared for his children the court should take action The fact that in some cases the father has been there from the childbirth till five and six years old and the mother just rips the child from the father this cannot have a positive effect on the child and therefore can only be seen as the mother is using the children to hurt father as a tool
